message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $1,150,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your interest but $1,150,000 is simply too low. Let's compromise - I'm willing to lower my price to $1,250,000. This is still a good deal for you, and it allows me to get closer to my desired price. What do you say?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with a price of $1,200,000. This is the highest I can go while staying within my budget. I hope this meets your expectations.
